org.locationtech.geowave.core.store

Interface DataStore

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    MapReduceDataStore
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AccumuloDataStore, BaseDataStore, BaseMapReduceDataStore, CassandraDataStore, DynamoDBDataStore, HBaseDataStore

    public interface DataStore
    A DataStore can both ingest and query data based on persisted indices and data adapters. When the data is ingested it is explicitly given an index and a data adapter which is then persisted to be used in subsequent queries.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> IndexWriter<T> createWriter(WritableDataAdapter<T> adapter, PrimaryIndex... index)
      Returns an index writer to perform batched write operations
      boolean delete(QueryOptions queryOptions, Query query)
      Delete all data in this data store that matches the query parameter within the index described by the index passed in and matches the adapter (the same adapter ID as the ID ingested).
      <T> CloseableIterator<T> query(QueryOptions queryOptions, Query query)
      Returns all data in this data store that matches the query parameter within the index described within the QueryOptions.

    • Method Detail

      • createWriter

        <T> IndexWriter<T> createWriter(WritableDataAdapter<T> adapter,
                                PrimaryIndex... index)
                         throws MismatchedIndexToAdapterMapping
        Returns an index writer to perform batched write operations
        Parameters:
        adapter - The adapter that describes the data written to the set of indices.
        index - The configuration information for the primary index to use.
        Returns:
        Returns the index writer which can be used for batch write operations
        Throws:
        MismatchedIndexToAdapterMapping

      • query

        <T> CloseableIterator<T> query(QueryOptions queryOptions,
                               Query query)
        Returns all data in this data store that matches the query parameter within the index described within the QueryOptions. If by the index passed in and matches the adapter (the same adapter ID as the ID ingested). All data that matches the query, adapter ID, and is in the index ID will be returned as an instance of the native data type that this adapter supports. The iterator will only return as many results as the limit passed in.
        Parameters:
        queryOptions - additional options for the processing the query
        the - data constraints for the query
        Returns:
        An iterator on all results that match the query. The iterator implements Closeable and it is best practice to close the iterator after it is no longer needed.

      • delete

        boolean delete(QueryOptions queryOptions,
               Query query)
        Delete all data in this data store that matches the query parameter within the index described by the index passed in and matches the adapter (the same adapter ID as the ID ingested). All data that matches the query, adapter ID, and is in the index ID will be deleted. For ({@link org.locationtech.geowave.core.store.query.AdapterIdQuery), all supporting statistics and secondary indices are also deleted. Statistics and secondary indices are updated as required for all other types of queries.
        Parameters:
        queryOptions - additional options for the processing the query
        the - data constraints for the query
        Returns:
        true on success
